attributes.title: Terrible app!! Do NOT download!!

attributes.title: My phone broke bc of this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app bc I was torn in who to vote for. Immediately after downloading I got a virus on my phone causing it to crash. I brought it to an Apple store but it could not be fixed. I just lost a brand new 1100 dollar phone bc of this app.

attributes.title: WARNING
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I downloaded the app and as I went to open it I instantly turned into a Cheeto...yes, a Cheeto. Now when people look at me all they see is a ‚Äúsnack‚Äù when I am AN ENTIRE FRICKIN MEAL. This app has changed my entire identity for the worse and I cannot just sit back and let it destroy more peoples lives.

attributes.title: worst app ever
